price: 24. « Descendez ! dit (Allah), vous serez ennemis les uns des autres ; et vous aurez sur terre séjour et jouissance, jusqu’à la fin d’une échéance.
arabic: قَالَ ٱهۡبِطُواْ بَعۡضُكُمۡ لِبَعۡضٍ عَدُوّٞۖ وَلَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُسۡتَقَرّٞ وَمَتَٰعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla ih'biṭū baʿḍukum libaʿḍin ʿaduwwun walakum fī al-arḍi mus'taqarrun wamatāʿun ilā ḥīnin
